articles.description: Multiple videos of TikTok users wearing iPod shuffle as hair-clip and earrings have surfaced on the platform in recent weeks.
articles.content: Apple iPod shuffle used to be a luxury for college students and the young generation back when it was launched in 2005. It not only made life easy for people who were tired of carrying the heavy and … [+1972 chars]
